experiences.title: Technical Assistant
details: Troubleshot browser, network, and AV system issues at Korea Nazarene University
Performed routine PC and smart device diagnostics across academic buildings
Maintained CCTV, access control, and campus Wi-Fi systems

experiences.title: Artillery Signal Operator (Sergeant Squad Leader)
details: Led a 10-member squad as sergeant; trained soldiers in secure comm protocols and classified signal use
Led the unit to 2nd place in a brigade-level communication and leadership competition among 10 squads

experiences.title: Computer Repair Technician
details: Assisted customers with new computer and accessory purchases
Performed inventories on computers and repair equipment
Identified hardware issues caused by component failures using diagnostic tools
